suite2p.registration.reference¶

Module Contents¶

suite2p.registration.reference.sampled_mean(ops)[source]¶
suite2p.registration.reference.pick_initial_reference(frames)[source]¶

computes the initial reference image

the seed frame is the frame with the largest correlations with other frames; the average of the seed frame with its top 20 correlated pairs is the inital reference frame returned

Parameters

frames (int16) – frames from binary (frames x Ly x Lx)

Returns

refImg – initial reference image (Ly x Lx)

Return type

int16

suite2p.registration.reference.iterative_alignment(ops, frames, refImg)[source]¶

iterative alignment of initial frames to compute reference image

the seed frame is the frame with the largest correlations with other frames; the average of the seed frame with its top 20 correlated pairs is the inital reference frame returned

Parameters

  • ops (dictionary) – requires ‘nonrigid’, ‘smooth_sigma’, ‘bidiphase’, ‘1Preg’

  • frames (int16) – frames from binary (frames x Ly x Lx)

  • refImg (int16) – initial reference image (Ly x Lx)

Returns

refImg – final reference image (Ly x Lx)

Return type

int16

suite2p.registration.reference.compute_reference_image(ops, bin_file)[source]¶

compute the reference image

computes initial reference image using ops[‘nimg_init’] frames

Parameters

  • ops (dictionary) – requires ‘nimg_init’, ‘nonrigid’, ‘smooth_sigma’, ‘bidiphase’, ‘1Preg’, ‘reg_file’, (optional ‘keep_movie_raw’, ‘raw_movie’)

  • bin_file (str) – location of binary file with data

Returns

refImg – initial reference image (Ly x Lx)

Return type

int16

suite2p.registration.reference.subsample_frames(ops, bin_file, nsamps)[source]¶

get nsamps frames from binary file for initial reference image :param ops: requires ‘Ly’, ‘Lx’, ‘nframes’ :type ops: dictionary :param bin_file: :type bin_file: open binary file :param nsamps: number of frames to return :type nsamps: int

Returns

frames – frames x Ly x Lx

Return type

int16
